Articles.Content:
Greetings, Thats my First post ever in this Forum so be gentle ;P

Inspired by RLA Electric Engines, I decided to make my own Versions of Electric Engines and Support parts.

Since i started making parts 2 weeks ago, i created some stuff i really like and wanted to let u guys be part of it.

For now just with some Pics because im not finished with the texturing yet.

Hope you guys like what you see, leave a comment if u like ~

Peace, FirenX
Sorry, but visually not very well implemented
A very... Alien mod, well done for a first attempt.

You are much farther along than I am.

So far I have made one fuel tank in Blender and I have no idea what to do next in Unity.

I would suggest more elaborate textures.
And less glaring colors. They look very, very cartoony now. But it's still very impressive for first part-pack. ()b
What are you talking about? This is genuine 80ies style. Slap some chrome on it and youre grand :'D
=D alrighty guys thanks for the feedback guess ill be working on my textures first
I can't read that font you're using on the pics, could you switch to something legible? Otherwise, a good start, it's nice to see someone building a whole set before they release.
Nice job for first try. Give it another go with your models/textures. Look forward to future attempts.
Engines are WAY to high trust for electric engines. You have a 1m electric engine producing more thrust than most LF/O counterparts.

Engines are WAY to high trust for electric engines. You have a 1m electric engine producing more thrust than most LF/O counterparts.

I know ;P that is the meaning of them. I liked the concept of electric engines but they are to weak for my gameplay, So i made them strong enough to get in competition with other engines.

Quick Update: I worked on the textures of some parts, they dont look that comic like now.

please rate the new style

Peace, FirenX

Quick Update: I worked on the textures of some parts, they dont look that comic like now.

please rate the new style

Peace, FirenX

Now we are cooking with gas!!!! Nice work.

Looks good, although the Hexels made text isn't very nice to read . The textures are looking better, they could still use a little work though, focus on the parts and maintaining balanced stats then worry about the textures when you can't think of what else to do.

I know ;P that is the meaning of them. I liked the concept of electric engines but they are to weak for my gameplay, So i made them strong enough to get in competition with other engines.

Thats unfortunate to hear.

Looks better, can you add texture to the emissive part?

Some of the blue areas still look a bit plain.

Thats unfortunate to hear.

I agree. I mean I guess it's up to anyone playing to play the game how every the want, one thing about this game I love is the science.
Looks very handy. Just work on the textures a bit more:)
